name: gPrivacy - Hide non-contextual context menu entry
description:
The Google Privacy (gPrivacy) extension adds a context menu that's only contextual in that it only appears on pages where the extension is active.

It can't be disabled and needlessly clutters up the context menu with an option that just opens the preferences dialog from about:addons

This userstyle hides that entry to keep your context menu clean.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.
